name: The One Place
description:
Made for Indie Tales Jam

You and dozens of cube at same place try to avoid touch them and get the juicy looking fruits.

A-D > Move Left and Move Left

W > Jump 

Left Mouse > Shoot the teleport projectile

E > Teleport to the projectiles

Right Mouse > Cancel the projectile ( To prevents bug if the projectile disappears when colliding with player)
